e140cd3c-e092-40b5-acca-a14cf98a1226.description: Badge earners of the OBM School Operations Management Micro-Credential have a fundamental understanding of Operations Management and the ability to streamline business operations for maximum efficiency. They have demonstrated the ability to lead clients and teams in operations management. These individuals are able to outline and communicate an effective plan for optimizing business operations, streamline existing operations, and effectively delegate responsibilities within a team.
e140cd3c-e092-40b5-acca-a14cf98a1226.name: OBM School Micro-Credential: Operations Management

badge_template_activities.title: Participated (and/or reviewed the recording and materials) in OBM School's group breakout session with experts in the field, guiding participants through Operations Management best practices and considerations based on real-world scenarios.
Submitted a robust set of projects to the OBM School team to assess the earner's understanding of Operations Management.

Scored a passing grade in the OBM School's Operations Management project, which requires badge earners to demonstrate their ability to identify gaps in a business operations and define clear and effective solutions for streamlining operations for optimal efficiency.

0ffa8764-ea76-49ec-a8ce-9483e4041d65.description: Badge earners of the OBM School Business Management Systems Micro-Credential have a fundamental understanding of the key systems present in business management, and have displayed the ability to apply critical thinking as a means to prioritize these systems and automations within a business. These individuals are able to effectively audit a business’ systems structure, and provide effective solutions for streamlining, implementing systems and establishing order and procedures.
0ffa8764-ea76-49ec-a8ce-9483e4041d65.name: OBM School Micro-Credential: Business Management Systems

badge_template_activities.title: Participated (and/or reviewed the recording and materials) in OBM School's group breakout session with experts in the field, guiding participants through the process of setting up Business Management Systems in scenarios based on real-world examples.
Submitted a robust set of projects to the OBM School team to assess the earner's understanding of Business Management Systems.

Scored a passing grade in the OBM School's Business Management Systems project, which requires badge earners to demonstrate their ability to identify the key systems present in business management, and the ability to apply critical thinking in order to prioritize systems and automations within a business.

Scored a passing grade in the OBM School's Business Management Systems project, which requires the creation of a Standard Operation Procedure (SOP) based on the real-life scenarios provided by OBM School.

1eb3bc34-2867-4699-b362-51997d6defe2.description: Badge earners of the OBM School Project Management Micro-Credential have a fundamental understanding of Project Management and the ability to manage and lead projects from inception through to successful completion.. They have demonstrated the ability to create an actionable project plan and a structured set of project deliverables. These individuals are able to effectively delegate project tasks, roles & responsibilities within a team.
1eb3bc34-2867-4699-b362-51997d6defe2.name: OBM School Micro-Credential: Project Management

badge_template_activities.title: Participated (and/or reviewed the recording and materials) in OBM School's group breakout session with experts in the field, guiding participants through the process of efficient Project Management and leadership in scenarios based on real-world examples.
Submitted a robust set of projects to the OBM School team to assess the earner's understanding of Project Management.

Scored a passing grade in the OBM School’s Project Management project, which requires badge earners to create a streamlined set of timely project deliverables in line with the project timeline, and to demonstrate their ability to apply critical thinking in order to prioritize and delegate roles and responsibilities within a team.

7e53b0cf-15c7-4da8-8580-3e76dd28d244.description: Badge earners of the OBM School Team Management Micro-Credential have a fundamental understanding of Team Management and the ability to manage and lead teams, including but not limited to working within a remote team and environment. These individuals have demonstrated their ability to exercise critical thinking to determine the best new hires, manage successful team onboarding and offboarding practices, and proactively manage the hiring process from start to finish.
7e53b0cf-15c7-4da8-8580-3e76dd28d244.name: OBM School Micro-Credential: Team Management

badge_template_activities.title: Participated (and/or reviewed the recording and materials) in OBM School's group breakout session with experts in the field, guiding participants through the process of Team Management and leadership, and how to identify and lead the hiring process, in scenarios based on real-world examples.
Submitted a robust set of projects to the OBM School team to assess the earner's understanding of Team Management.

Scored a passing grade in the OBM School’s Team Management project, which requires badge earners to apply critical thinking in order to build out a remote hiring process for new team members, including the creation of job descriptions, hiring questionnaires, and the interview process as well as onboarding and training.

Scored a passing grade in the OBM School’s Team Management project, which requires badge earners to create a hiring project for a potential new hire, apply critical thinking in order to prioritize the right hire for the short and long-term success of the business, and outline an onboarding plan for the new team member.

184ecf65-a406-470f-8d31-1f5f41660d60.description: Badge earners of OBM Accreditation have an advanced understanding of Online Business Management. These individuals have gained micro-credentials in the 6 core fundamental hard skills of Online Business Management: Business Management Systems, Operations Management, Project Management, Team Management, Marketing & Metrics Management, and Launch Management.
184ecf65-a406-470f-8d31-1f5f41660d60.name: OBM Accreditation

Submitted a robust set of projects to the OBM School team to assess the earner's understanding of each of the key Online Business Management skill sets, including: Business Management Systems, Operations Management, Project Management, Team Management, Marketing & Metrics Management, and Launch Management.

Scored passing grades in all six comprehensive OBM School projects, in the areas of: Business Management Systems, Operations Management, Project Management, Team Management, Marketing & Metrics Management, and Launch Management.

Graduated from the OBM School Accreditation program took part in OBM School’s live educational experience for a 6 months, including attendance in (or reviewing recording and materials of) live Breakout Sessions to prepare for project submissions based on real-world scenarios as well as group coaching, live Q&A sessions with expert mentors, guest expert training sessions.

d84b5dfc-64ff-426d-bfca-7ee64fea4680.description: Badge earners of the OBM School Launch Management Micro-Credential have a fundamental understanding of Launch Management, and the ability to effectively manage and implement launch objectives. Badge earners have demonstrated their ability to exercise critical thinking to create an effective launch strategy. Individuals are able to create, implement and execute a launch plan by allocating key resources and optimize launch efforts via continuous evaluation of metrics, procedures and resources.
d84b5dfc-64ff-426d-bfca-7ee64fea4680.name: OBM School Micro-Credential: Launch Management

badge_template_activities.title: Participated (and/or reviewed the recording and materials) in OBM School's group breakout session with experts in the field, guiding participants through the process of efficient Launch Management in an exercise based on real-world scenarios.
Submitted a robust set of projects to the OBM School team to assess the earner's understanding of Launch Management.

Scored a passing grade in the OBM School’s Launch Management project, which required badge earners to create a comprehensive plan for launching a product/service. This included the pre, during and post-launch tasks with clearly defined deliverables and delegation within the team and contractors. Badge earners were then required to present their plan to the client, giving a thorough explanation of each stage of the process, key deliverables, and resources needed to execute the plan.

skills.name: Business Plan Or Product Launch Strategy

e85931f9-8d82-482c-89fb-80e8fa24c5cf.description: Badge earners of the OBM School Marketing & Metrics Management Micro-Credential have a fundamental understanding of Marketing & Metrics Management, including marketing activities and strategy. Badge earners have demonstrated their ability to exercise critical thinking to create a strategic marketing plan, identify and report on key marketing performance metrics.
e85931f9-8d82-482c-89fb-80e8fa24c5cf.name: OBM School Micro-Credential: Marketing & Metrics Management

badge_template_activities.title: Participated (and/or reviewed the recording and materials) in OBM School's group breakout session with experts in the field, guiding participants through the process of efficient Marketing & Metrics Management in an exercise based on real-world scenarios.
Submitted a robust set of projects to the OBM School team to assess the earner's understanding of Marketing & Metrics Management.

Scored a passing grade in the OBM School’s Marketing & Metrics Management project, which required badge earners to review client intake materials in order to assess and define the KPIs and marketing strategy for a podcast launch. Badge earners were required to identify and present key marketing metrics to measure throughout the launch (including pre-launch, during launch, and post-launch metrics), as well as a plan for executing the marketing strategy.
